enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Fatou Gaye (Gambia) and Jean-Pascal van Ypersele (Belgium) reported on the work of the contact group.
On the draft COP-8 decision, delegates diverged on the text relating to the financial mechanism.
Following protracted discussions, delegates agreed to forward the draft decision to the COP (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/L.23/Add.1).
